attributes.action: Grant citizenship to all retired or serving  Gurkhas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give all Gurkhas the right to live in the United Kingdom and become citizens, not just thoes who were brought back from Hong Kong in 1997 they all served in the Forces and deserve recognition for doing so

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
